mdRecord.dcterms:description: This group of items were fastened together. One item is a black and white photograph which shows four people -- three men and a woman -- standing in front of a house. The handwritten note on the back says, "All Cousins, A. Barbour, H. Shalker [added in another hand: (Father)], Charlotte Harvey, Kluete [?] Holmes" and in another hand, "Late 30's." The second item is a black and white photograph showing four people -- three men and a woman -- standing in front of a house. The handwritten note on the back says, "A. Barbour, H. L. Walker, Charlotte Harvey, Clay Holmes Bro. to Dwight -- Cousins" and in another hand, "Late 30s." The third item is a handwritten note which reads as follows: "Alexander Edward Barbour (Cousin Alex), Harry Lee Walker, Charlotte Harvey, Clay Holmes (Brother to Dwight. Taken on Massie Street in 30's."
mdRecord.dcterms:title: A. E. Barbour, H. L. Walker, C. Harvey, and C. Holmes on Massie Street, Late 30s (photograph)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Photographs
Barbour, Alexander Edward
Walker, Harry Lee
